thread.section_title: Impericon Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Impericon | www.impericon.com | 5 von 132
thread.title: Howard Paka Walsh
thread.title_full: Impericon bewertet von Howard Paka Walsh

author: Howard Paka Walsh
title: Howard Paka Walsh
text:
I love the t-shirt, and I also got a fun lack of stickers which was unexpected and cool because I collect stickers and things like that, impericon kept me updated via email on my orders status which was also cool.
The reason I haven't rates 5 stars though is purely because this was my second order this month, my first one I ordered, and it should have come within 3-5 days, I didn't hear anything from impericon for a week, and then when I did, it said they had ran out of stock. I got a speedy refund, but the website shouldn't have let me order of stock was out, it was a bit annoying and a let down, but this time everything was smooth sailing and I'm very happy.
